title: [Saewehna Jungle, Lagoon]
description: Moonlight barely illuminates the murky depths of a vast lagoon stretching out before the tumble of water rushing down from the plateaus above.  The nocturnal melody of the jungle serves as a striking companion to the surprisingly quiet sound of the bi-level falls cascading from the lowest outcropping to feed the pool.  Deep shadows help to almost completely conceal the presence of a cave hidden behind the ripple of the liquid curtain.

A vast lagoon of brilliant blue depths stretches out before the tumble of water rushing down from the plateaus above.  The bi-level falls are surprisingly quiet as the water cascades from its lowest outcropping to feed the pool, and the ripple of the liquid curtain only partially conceals the shadows of a cave beneath the ledge.  Plumes of mist rise into the air constantly, casting glistening dew upon everything within close proximity.
room.location: the environs of the Saewehna Lagoon
